job.title: Remote - Sr. Frontend Software Engineer (Angular)
job.description: If you are a Remote  Sr Frontend Software Engineer Angular with experience please read onltbrgtltbrgtFounded by the same folks behind Cameo and Twitter our founders were medical students looking for a more unconventional study method They created an online learning platform that helps medical students study and learn in a more engaging and fun way Since 2012 we have experienced steady growth and are wellfunded but we arent done yet Thats where you come inltbrgtltbrgtWe are looking to continue our growth this year by adding members to our Frontend Backend and Data Engineering Team A company that tries to break the norm and add excitement to learning we offer an amazing company culture full benefits workfromhome office career growth opportunities and competitive compensation If you are a strong Frontend Engineer with Angular experience and enjoy working on web applications that help our users learn in a more exciting way this is the position for youltbrgtltbrgtWhat You Will Be DoingltbrgtltbrgtThis position will be focused on creating a comprehensive and featurerich web application utilizing Angularltbrgtltulgtltligt Design build and scale etcltligtltligt Write Unite Integration and E2E tests while advocating TestDriven DevelopmentltbrgtltligtltulgtWhat You Need for this Positionltbrgtltulgtltligt Bachelors Degree Preferredltligtltligt 3 Years of professional experience using Angular on web applicationsltligtltligt Experience with HTML CSS and JQueryltligtltligt Experience with Unit Testing and TestDriven development
